endpoints.description: Retrieve the current stock levels of all medications managed by the system.
Add a new medication to the inventory with specified details including initial stock level.
Update the details of an existing medication including name, stock level, or other relevant attributes.
Remove a medication from the inventory based on its unique identifier.
Retrieve a list of medications that are below the predefined low-stock threshold.
Retrieve a list of medications nearing their expiration dates within a specified timeframe.
Generate and retrieve detailed inventory management reports for analysis.
Create a new order to replenish stock for specified medications.
Retrieve the current status and details of a specific order.
Cancel a pending order based on its unique order identifier.
